result.title: [HELP] 740D. Alyona and a tree
result.content:
problem link: http://codeforces.com/contest/740/problem/D

I don't understand after performing binary lifting [determining for each node all the ancestors of distance 2^j that control it] how to calculate the answer for all the ancestors that control it not only who's distance at 2^j.

any clarification ?

thanks.
